creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of dilapidated buildings of wood and corrugated metal, with grid of windowpanes at top center; piles of clothing and other textiles draped up at right and strewn on ground in foreground; electrical wires forming V at top of image
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: West Oakland Studio
